channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Justice Department says it’s releasing 3 million pages from its Jeffrey Epstein files
item.description: The Justice Department says it’s releasing 3 million pages of documents in the latest Jeffrey Epstein disclosure, along with 2,000 videos and 180,000 images.

item.title: Judge bars federal prosecutors from seeking the death penalty against Luigi Mangione
Trump’s choice of Warsh to lead Fed could reshape the world’s most influential central bank
